cgb_interactive.pyÂ¶

Launches an interactive python session with useful libraries loaded, e.g. the clustergb package. Great for exploring your results, for example:

cd ~/my_cgb_project
cgb_interactive.py

>>> proj = cgb.osio.load_project()
>>> for cn in proj.child_names:
...     job = cgb.osio.load_job(cn)
...     print(cn, job.gb.gb_energy)
...
(gb1, 503.248)
(gb2, 397.274)
(gb3, 440.119)
